#Fauci says ppl living w/HIV should be vaccinated. They're @ higher risk of major issues from COVID19. 
He doesn't say EXCEPT ppl on meds w/undetectable viral load. All that that does is restricts transmission of HIV. Ppl with HIV SHOULD be vaccinated! #COVID19 #vaccine #HIV https://t.co/Xe8sJGxUXv
